template<typename Container, typename Selector>
int calcPacketSize (  int  headerSize,
const Container &  disturbances,
Selector  selectValue
) 
 

Calculates the packet size needed for a set of disturbances.

Parameters:
headerSize The size in bytes for the packet header.
disturbances The disturbances to calculate packet size for.
selectValue A value selector, this is used to fetch the value from the containers value.
Returns:
packet size needed to fit all these disturbances.

Calculate the packet size needed to store one disturbance element.

Parameters:
disturbance The element to use when calculating packet size.
Returns:
Number of bytes needed to store a disturbance element.
